Package src

Class StackBuilder<T>

java.lang.Object
src.StackBuilder<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Container<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
StackIntegers
public class StackBuilder<T> extends Object implements Container<T>
This new builderclass will implement the Container Interface, providing functionality to create a Stack of objects of type T.
